content: Clippy has a PR (https://github.com/rust-lang/rust-clippy/pull/6016) that fixes multiple FPs in a warn-by-default lint, we would like to backport. I kind of forgot to do it 3 weeks ago. Can I still open a backport PR or is it to close to the next release to backport something?
I think it's fine to backport it, as long as y'all are confident it's not going to cause regressions
Alright, then I open a PR soon (~1h). We haven't had any complaints since merging the fixing PR, so I'm confident, that it doesn't cause regressions.
